examples.en: Can't help it.
I could not help laughing.
examples.ru: Я не мог удержаться от смеха.

examples.en: Help her off the train.
Help him out of the car.
Crying won't help.
examples.ru: Плач не поможет. / Слёзы не помогут.

examples.en: I couldn't help but laugh.
Help them into the house.
She can't help thinking of it.
examples.ru: Она не может не думать об этом.

examples.en: I can't help myself — I have to smoke.
examples.ru: Ничего не могу с собой поделать — ужасно хочется курить.

examples.en: It can't be helped.
Can I be of any help to you?
Ask for help if necessary.
examples.ru: В случае необходимости обратитесь за помощью.

examples.en: They couldn't help the accident.
He thanked us for our help.
You've been a real help to me, Carrie.
They helped to cook the meal.
Help! Somebody call the police!
She never helps around the house.
examples.ru: Она никогда не помогает по дому.

examples.en: She helped herself to the dessert.
Can you help me carry this table?
examples.ru: Вы мне не поможете перенести этот стол?

examples.en: Don't be longer than you can help.
Tell the guests to help themselves.
She could not help watching the sad spectacle.
examples.ru: Она не смогла удержаться от того, чтобы понаблюдать за этим печальным зрелищем.

examples.en: She helped to move the furniture.
She was a big / great help to us.
Humor often helps a tense situation.
examples.ru: Юмор часто выручает в напряжённой ситуации.

examples.en: She helped him choose some new clothes.
examples.ru: Она помогла ему подобрать новую одежду.

examples.en: Bright curtains will help the room.
This will help to prevent accidents.
We helped them in / with their work.
